question: Which statement describes the location of our Sun in the universe?
candidate_answers: (A) Our Sun orbits Earth in the Andromeda galaxy. (B) Our Sun orbits Earth in the Milky Way galaxy. (C) Our Sun is the center of a solar system in the Milky Way galaxy. (D) Our Sun is the center of a solar system in the Andromeda galaxy.
answer: Our Sun orbits Earth in the Milky Way galaxy.
label: B
